title: Set alias for columns in dataset but expression builder shows old column names in the dataset
OB: When a dataset has aliases for its columns and the user selects the dataset in the expression builder, the expression builder still shows the original column names instead of the aliases.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
